Package ispd.motor.workload.impl.task

Class TraceTaskInfo

java.lang.Object
ispd.motor.workload.impl.task.TraceTaskInfo
public class TraceTaskInfo extends Object
Class to represent the information gathered from a trace file about a single task. See TraceTaskInfo(String) for details about how the file contents are interpreted.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    TraceTaskInfo (String s)
    Create a task information instance from the given String; the string is split on its quotes ('"') and the resulting array of strings is interpreted as 'fields' to be parsed.

  • Constructor Details

    • TraceTaskInfo

      public TraceTaskInfo (String s)
      Create a task information instance from the given String; the string is split on its quotes ('"') and the resulting array of strings is interpreted as 'fields' to be parsed. The relation of the index of a field in the array and what it is interpreted as is as follows:
      1. [IGNORED]
      2. Task Id
      3. [IGNORED]
      4. Creation Time
      5. [IGNORED]
      6. Status
      7. [IGNORED]
      8. Computation Size
      9. [IGNORED]
      10. Communication Size
      11. [IGNORED]
      12. User Id
      Any further fields are also ignored.
      Parameters:
      s - String to be split and interpreted as fields containing task attributes.

  • Method Details

    • id

      public int id()
      Returns:
      the ID (an integral value) parsed from the task info.

    • user

      public String user()
      Returns:
      the user ID (name) parsed from the task info.

    • computationSize

      public double computationSize()
      Returns:
      the computation size (in MFlops) parsed from the task info.

    • communicationSize

      public double communicationSize()
      Returns:
      the communication size (in MBits) parsed from the task info.

    • creationTime

      public double creationTime()
      Returns:
      the creation time (in seconds) parsed from the task info.

    • shouldBeCanceled

      public boolean shouldBeCanceled()
      Determines if the task information parsed demands that the task should be cancelled or not. Specifically, a task should be cancelled if its "status" field either contains as a substring "0" or "5".
      Returns:
      true if this task should be cancelled (according to the task information in the file), and false otherwise.
